tool_description: This api provides you 12 fake store products
name: Ecommerce Products
title: Ecommerce Products

api_list.name: Get a specific item by their id
Products
api_list.description: This endpoints returns all the products data of the api..
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ecommerce-products.p.rapidapi.com/products"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecommerce-products.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ecommerce-products.p.rapidapi.com/products"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecommerce-products.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
